item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description:
1. meta-learning: decision process on what knowledge you need to know
  2. what exactly is the prime bang for your buck in terms of small model (survey paper)

This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.

item.title: Math Typesetting
item.description: Mathematical notation in a Hugo project can be enabled by using third party JavaScript libraries.
